title: Amisulpride
summary: Amisulpride is an antiemetic and antipsychotic medication used at lower doses intravenously to prevent and treat postoperative nausea and vomiting; and at higher doses by mouth to treat schizophrenia and acute psychotic episodes. It is sold under the brand names Barhemsys[8] (as an antiemetic) and Solian, Socian, Deniban and others (as an antipsychotic).[5] It is also used to treat dysthymia.[9]
